one.contentbox.boxd.protocol

接口 BoxdClient

  • 所有已知实现类:
    RpcBoxdClientImpl

    public interface BoxdClient
    Boxd client to interact with boxd rpc node

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String addNode(java.lang.String nodeId)
      Add the given nodeId to local node, the local node will connect to the given node
      UnsignedTx createRawTransaction(java.lang.String from, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> to, long fee, java.util.List<Utxo> utxos)
      Create unsigned transaction by UTXOs
      java.util.List<Utxo> fetchTokenUtxos(java.lang.String address, long amount, java.lang.String tokenHash, int tokenIndex)
      Get UTXOs by the given address, tokenHash and tokenIndex
      java.util.List<Utxo> fetchUtxos(java.lang.String address, long amount)
      Get UTXOs by the given address
      java.lang.Long getBalance(java.lang.String addr)
      Get the balance of the given address
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getBalances(java.util.List<java.lang.String> addrs)
      Get the balance of the given addresses
      Block getBlock(int height)
      Get block info by the block height

      Get block info by the block hash
      java.lang.String getBlockHash(int blockHeight)
      Get block hash of the block by height

      Get header info of a block by the block height

      Get header info of a block by the block hash
      int getBlockHeight()
      Get the height of the last block
      NetworkID getNetworkId()
      Get network id
      java.util.List<Node> getNodeInfo()
      Get rpc node info

      Get the token balance by the given address, tokenHash and tokenIndex

      Get the token balance by the given address, tokenHash and tokenIndex
      UnsignedSplitAddrTx makeUnsignedSplitAddrTx(SplitAddrTx splitAddrTxReq)
      Make unsigned split address tx
      UnsignedTokenIssueTx makeUnsignedTokenIssueTx(TokenIssueTx tokenIssueTxReq)
      Make unsigned token issue tx, if submited, this will issue a token
      UnsignedTx makeUnsignedTokenTransferTx(TokenTransferTx tokenTransferTxReq)
      Make unsigned token transfer tx

      Make unsigned common transaction on-chain

      Make unsigned common transaction on-chain

      Send transaction to the chain, it will come into the memory pool

      Sign a unsigned transaction
      BlockDetail viewBlockDetail(java.lang.String hash)
      Get block info by the given block hash
      ExtendTxDetail viewTxDetail(java.lang.String hash)
      Get transaction info by the given transaction hash
